flavorText:
"I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on."
—Idrus, war priest of Thune

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich dachte, der Wind brächte mich ins Jenseits, doch er hob mich auf die Füße und ich kämpfte weiter." —Idrus, Kriegspriester von Thune
foreignData.name: Belohnung des Glaubens
foreignData.text: Bringe alle bleibenden Karten aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück, die in diesem Zug aus dem Spiel dorthin gelegt wurden.

foreignData.flavorText: "Creí que el viento me estaba acompañando a mi destino final, pero me puso de nuevo en pie y seguí luchando." —Idrus, sacerdote guerrero de Thune
foreignData.name: Recompensa de la fe
foreignData.text: Regresa al campo de batalla todas las cartas de permanente de tu cementerio que hayan ido allí desde el campo de batalla este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « J'ai bien cru que le vent me poussait vers ma destination finale alors qu'en fait, il m'a remis sur pieds, et j'ai continué le combat. » —Idrus, prêtre de guerre de Thiune
foreignData.name: Récompense de la foi
foreignData.text: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille toutes les cartes de permanent de votre cimetière qui ont été mises, ce tour-ci, dans votre cimetière depuis le champ de bataille.

foreignData.flavorText: "Credevo che il vento mi stesse accompagnando verso la mia destinazione finale, invece mi rimise in piedi e io continuai a combattere." —Idrus, sacerdote guerriero di Thune
foreignData.name: Premio della Fede
foreignData.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia tutte le carte permanenti nel tuo cimitero che vi erano state messe dal campo di battaglia in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「風が終焉の地へといざなうものと思っていたが、風は私を立たせ、そして私は戦い続けた。」 ――テューンの戦僧、イドラス
foreignData.name: 信仰の見返り
foreignData.text: このターンに戦場からあなたの墓地に置かれたすべてのパーマネント・カードを戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: "바람이 나를 저승으로 데려가는 것이라 생각했지만, 오히려 그 바람은 나를 다시 일으켜 세웠고 나는 전투를 계속했다." —쑨의 전쟁 사제 이드러스
foreignData.name: 신념의 보상
foreignData.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 지속물 카드 중, 이 턴에 전장으로부터 무덤에 들어간 모든 지속물 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu pensei que o vento estivesse me empurrando para a minha jornada final, mas ele me colocou de pé e eu continuei lutando." — Idrus, sacerdote de guerra de Thune
foreignData.name: Recompensa da Fé
foreignData.text: Devolva ao campo de batalha todos os cards de permanentes no seu cemitério que foram colocados lá vindos do campo de batalha neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я подумал, что ветер поведет меня в последний путь, но он поднял меня на ноги, и я продолжил сражаться». — Идрус, военный священник из Туна
foreignData.name: Награда за Веру
foreignData.text: Верните на поле битвы все находящиеся на вашем кладбище карты перманентов, которые попали туда с поля битвы в этом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我原以为这风要将我引向死亡，然而它却令我重获力量，继续战斗。」～图恩战僧壹卓
foreignData.name: 信念报偿
foreignData.text: 将所有于本回合中从战场置入你坟墓场的永久物牌返回战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我原以為這風要將我引向死亡，然而它卻令我重獲力量，繼續戰鬥。」～圖恩戰僧壹卓
foreignData.name: 信念報償
foreignData.text: 將所有於本回合中從戰場置入你墳墓場的永久物牌返回戰場。

name: Faith's Reward
originalText: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

rulings.text: A permanent card is a card that could be put onto the battlefield. Specifically, it means an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card (instant and sorcery cards aren’t permanent cards).

Permanent cards that were put into your graveyard from anywhere else, such as a card that was discarded, stay in the graveyard. Permanent cards that you gained control of and went to another player’s graveyard from the battlefield will likewise stay in the graveyard.

You choose what an Aura card put onto the battlefield this way will enchant. You can’t choose any permanent cards entering the battlefield at the same time as that Aura. If there’s nothing legal for the Aura to enchant, it stays in the graveyard.
Permanent spells that were countered earlier in the turn never entered the battlefield, so they won’t return to the battlefield because of Faith’s Reward.

text: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
